title: We spoke with AT&T's SVP of Advanced Solutions on how the coronavirus is impacting healthcare IoT — and what the new normal will look like
description: This interview was delivered to Business Insider Intelligence Connectivity & Tech Briefing subscribers earlier today. To get more content like this to your inbox each day, hours before they're published on Business Insider, click here. The coronavirus is plac…
content: The coronavirus is placing an unprecedented strain on health systems — presenting network providers with an opportunity to help hospitals prepare for, contain, and diagnose the virus with IoT connectivity. For example, AT&T is equipping robots that automa… [+6559 chars]
